value.title: Artificial intelligence can help detect heart disease based on facial photos
value.excerpt: Sending a "selfie" to the doctor could be a cheap and simple way of detecting heart disease, according to the authors of a new study published today (Friday) in the European Heart Journal .

value.title: India’s logistics SaaS startup FarEye bags $13 million
value.excerpt: More than 150 e-commerce and delivery companies globally use an Indian logistics startup’s service to work out the optimum way to ship items to their customers. value.title: How a designer used AI and Photoshop to bring ancient Roman emperors back to life
value.excerpt: Machine learning is a fantastic tool for renovating old photos and videos. So much so that it can even bring ancient statues to life, transforming the chipped stone busts of long-dead Roman emperors into photorealistic faces you could imagine walking past on the street.
